name: NSMutableString
desc: A dynamic plain-text Unicode string object, for use instead of a String variable in cases that require reference semantics.

items.name: init(capacity: Int)
items.desc: Returns an NSMutableString object initialized with initial storage for a given number of characters,

items.name: func append(String)
items.desc: Adds to the end of the receiver the characters of a given string.

items.name: func applyTransform(StringTransform, reverse: Bool, range: NSRange, updatedRange: NSRangePointer?) -> Bool
items.desc: Transliterates the receiver by applying a specified ICU string transform.

items.name: func deleteCharacters(in: NSRange)
items.desc: Removes from the receiver the characters in a given range.

items.name: func insert(String, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts into the receiver the characters of a given string at a given location.

items.name: func replaceCharacters(in: NSRange, with: String)
items.desc: Replaces the characters from aRange with those in aString.

items.name: func replaceOccurrences(of: String, with: String, options: NSString.CompareOptions, range: NSRange) -> Int
items.desc: Replaces all occurrences of a given string in a given range with another given string, returning the number of replacements.

items.name: func setString(String)
items.desc: Replaces the characters of the receiver with those in a given string.
